You are looking at a Brand New Hilti PD 40 650 ft. Laser Range Meter Use the Hilti PD 40 650 ft. Laser Range Meter to take measurements from a wide range of distances. This meter is designed to be accurate to within 1/25 in., and can also add or subtract distances and determine square footage in a given area. The new Hilti PD 5 Laser Range Meter is the only tool of its kind that concentrates solely on the fundamental task of measuring... More
Shop for Hand Tools at The Home Depot. Ready, set, measure! The new Hilti PD 5 Laser Range Meter is the only tool of its kind that concentrates solely on the fundamental task of measuring distances. A person working alone with this tool can accurately measure distances of up to 230 feet at the touch of a button. The PD 5 is even easier to use than a smart phone, helping to reduce errors. Just aim at the target, press the button and read the distance from the display. Well protected by a rugged rubberized casing, the PD 5 is water and dust resistant, taking the harshest jobsite conditions in stride. Quench their thirst and boost impulse sales at your snack bar, buffet, or fast food restaurant with this Cecilware Arctic Deluxe 20/4PD four bowl 5.4 gallon... More
Your customers are parched! Quench their thirst and boost impulse sales at your snack bar, buffet, or fast food restaurant with this Cecilware Arctic Deluxe 20/4PD four bowl 5.4 gallon premix cold beverage dispenser. Because each bowl has its own motor, the four bowls operate independently of one another so that you have greater control over your beverages. At only 28 1/2" wide, this 4 bowl premix cold beverage dispenser features four 5.4 gallon refrigerated bowls for long-lasting refreshment while sacrificing minimal countertop space! With the ability to set the dispenser for fast or gentle agitation for juice or dairy beverages, it is perfect for serving three types of fruit juice, iced tea, iced coffee, and other refreshingly chilled drinks. The Cecilware Arctic Deluxe 20/4PD beverage dispenser's 1/7 hp compressor that uses R134A refrigerant will keep your beverages chilled and ready for consumption for hours at a time. It requires a 120V electrical connection and is UL and NSF Listed. Carries a Free manufacturers warranty as specified above, and has undergone strict quality checks for beam performance, ignition, voltage, appearance, connections, and run-time, so you can trust it to work flawlessly in your projector. Extended warranty is available at an additional cost. Item ships the same day if you place your order by 4 pm ET, Monday through Friday. Orders placed after 4 pm ET and before 5 pm ET may ship the same day. Orders placed over the weekend, on a holiday or after 5 pm ET during the week will ship the next business day. Please contact us to confirm when it will ship. (Excludes holidays and out-of-stock or special order items and if there is an issue with payment or obtaining a valid mailing address.)
